titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for reliefe of the subiect that might be otherwise damnified by the late burning of records in the Sixe Clarkes Office.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Offering re-enrolment gratis provided original documents or certified copies are furnished by 10 July--STC.
Dated at end: Westminster the seuenth day of Ianuary, in the nineteenth yeere of Our reigne ...
Arms 14; Steele notation: con- and 2) ori- the.
The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
